Structs/PopoverConfig/Source.html#/s:12P.name: barButtonItem(_:)
Structs/PopoverConfig/Source.html#/s:12P.abstract: Specifies that the popover should display from a UIBarButtonItem instance.

Structs/PopoverConfig/Source.html#/s:12P.name: view(container:frame:)
Structs/PopoverConfig/Source.html#/s:12P.abstract: Specifies that the popover should display from a UIView instance and be anchored on the specific frame.

Structs/PopoverConfig/Source.html.name: Source
Structs/PopoverConfig/Source.html.abstract: Describes the source view from which the popover is showing.

Structs/DismissButtonConfig/Content.html.name: text(_:)
Structs/DismissButtonConfig/Content.html.abstract: Specifies custom text for the bar button.

Structs/DismissButtonConfig/Content.html.name: image(_:)
Structs/DismissButtonConfig/Content.html.abstract: Specifies a custom image for the bar button.

Structs/DismissButtonConfig/Location.htm.name: left
Structs/DismissButtonConfig/Location.htm.abstract: The left side of the navigation bar.

Structs/DismissButtonConfig/Location.htm.name: right
Structs/DismissButtonConfig/Location.htm.abstract: The right side of the navigation bar.

Structs/DismissButtonConfig/Location.htm.name: Location
Structs/DismissButtonConfig/Location.htm.abstract: Specifies a bar button’s location in a navigation bar.

Structs/DismissButtonConfig/Content.html.name: Content
Structs/DismissButtonConfig/Content.html.abstract: Specifies the content (title or image) for the bar button.

Extensions/UIViewController.html#/s:So16.name: withNavigation()
Extensions/UIViewController.html#/s:So16.abstract: Wraps the receiving view controller in a navigation controller.

Extensions/UIViewController.html#/s:So16.name: withPresentation(_:)
Extensions/UIViewController.html#/s:So16.abstract: Applies the specified modal presentation style to the view controller.

Extensions/UIViewController.html#/s:So16.name: withTransition(_:)
Extensions/UIViewController.html#/s:So16.abstract: Applies the specified modal transition style to the view controller.

Extensions/UIViewController.html#/s:So16.name: withNavigationStyle(_:)
Extensions/UIViewController.html#/s:So16.abstract: Applies the specified navigation style to the view controller.

Extensions/UIViewController.html#/s:So16.name: withStyles(navigation:presentation:transition:)
Extensions/UIViewController.html#/s:So16.abstract: Applies the specified navigation style to the view controller.

Extensions/UIViewController.html#/s:So16.name: present(_:type:animated:completion:)
Extensions/UIViewController.html#/s:So16.abstract: Presents a view controller using the specified presentation type.

Extensions/UIViewController.html#/s:So16.name: addDismissButtonIfNeeded(config:)
Extensions/UIViewController.html#/s:So16.abstract: Adds a dismiss button having the provided configuration, if needed.

Extensions/UIViewController.html#/s:So16.name: addDismissButton(config:)
Extensions/UIViewController.html#/s:So16.abstract: Adds a dismiss button having the provided configuration.

Extensions/UINavigationController.html#/.name: push(_:animated:completion:)
Extensions/UINavigationController.html#/.abstract: Pushes the given view controller and calls the given closure upon completion.

Extensions/UINavigationController.html#/.name: pop(animated:completion:)
Extensions/UINavigationController.html#/.abstract: Pops the top view controller and calls the given closure upon completion.

Extensions/UIBarButtonItem.html#/s:So15U.name: init(config:target:action:)
Extensions/UIBarButtonItem.html#/s:So15U.abstract: Initializes a new bar button item using the specified configuration.

Enums/PresentationType.html#/s:12Present.name: modal(_:_:_:)
Enums/PresentationType.html#/s:12Present.abstract: A modal presentation type with the specified navigation, presentation, and transition styles.

Enums/PresentationType.html#/s:12Present.name: popover(_:)
Enums/PresentationType.html#/s:12Present.abstract: A popover presentation type with the specified configuration.

Enums/PresentationType.html#/s:12Present.name: show
Enums/PresentationType.html#/s:12Present.abstract: A show presentation type. This is an adaptive presentation that usually corresponds to .Push.

Enums/PresentationType.html#/s:12Present.name: showDetail(_:)
Enums/PresentationType.html#/s:12Present.abstract: A show detail presentation type. This is an adaptive presentation that usually corresponds to .Modal.

Enums/PresentationType.html#/s:12Present.name: custom(_:)
Enums/PresentationType.html#/s:12Present.abstract: A custom presentation style that uses the specified delegate.

Enums/PresentationType.html#/s:12Present.name: none
Enums/PresentationType.html#/s:12Present.abstract: No presentation type specified, use UIKit defaults. Use this when presenting system controllers, like UIAlertController.

Enums/NavigationStyle.html#/s:12Presente.name: none
Enums/NavigationStyle.html#/s:12Presente.abstract: Do not embed a view controller in a UINavigationController.

Enums/NavigationStyle.html.name: NavigationStyle
Enums/NavigationStyle.html.abstract: Specifies the navigation style for a view controller.

Enums/PresentationType.html.name: PresentationType
Enums/PresentationType.html.abstract: Describes the type of presentation for a view controller.
